caseSubject: U/A 184/Enforcement of Fundamental Rights / Human Rights
caseTitle: Engineer Iqbal Zafar Jhagra v. Federation of Pakistan and others
tagline: The Oil and Gas Regulatory Authority (OGRA) is directed to come up with a pricing formula for Compressed Natural Gas (CNG) based on evidence and in accordance with the prescribed process in a swift manner after obtaining all necessary feedback from the stakeholders.
